variants.Description in input context: This variant causes an amino acid change in the protein, potentially affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HeLa cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The protein expression level was found to be 70% for the variant NM_032876.4:c.195T>A compared to the wild-type protein.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 90% compared to the wild-type protein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% compared to the wild-type protein.
